I've  always been confused about the ending of this. I feel like the fact she kept...what did he give her? earrings?... for so long and then throwing them away only when he was completely broken was supposed to be symbolic, but honestly I don't know why she'd bother. It kinda really crams nonsensical backstory in the final two pages, there is open ended but that's ridiculously all over the place. Did she care? How much did she do was resentful? Why did it only matter that his balls were gone to completely give up on him? Was she waiting for him to "man" up the entire time?
There are quit a few manga about revealing an inner masochist, which are getting old.
